item.title: GameStop price target cut as analyst cites retailerâ€™s lack of strategy
item.description: GameStop Corp. surprised investors with a quarterly profit in its second-quarter results Tuesday, but the videogame retailer still has many challenges ahead, according to analyst firm Wedbush.

item.description: Republican nominee Donald Trump is the majority owner of Trump Media, which operates the social media platform Truth Social and trades as DJT on the Nasdaq.

item.title: Consumer prices rose 0.2% in August as annual inflation rate hits lowest since early 2021
item.description: The consumer price index was expected to increase 0.2% in August and 2.6% from a year ago.

item.description: Wireless carriers are offering bigger credits on this yearâ€™s Pro models than they did last year, which could help Apple drive more upgrades.

item.title: Berkshire unloads another chunk of Bank of America as CEO Moynihan lauds Buffett as great shareholder
item.description: Since mid-July, Berkshire Hathaway has sold more than 174.7 million shares of the Charlotte-based bank for $7.2 billion.

item.description: The consumer price index rose by 2.5% in August, on an annual basis. It was the lowest reading since February 2021.

item.title: Commerzbank shares jump 20% after UniCredit buys 4.5% stake from the German government
item.description: Commerzbank shares jumped on market open on Wednesday, after Italian bank UniCredit acquired a 4.5% stake in the Frankfurt-based lender from German government.

item.title: Trump tells Republicans to shut down government if hard-line voter ID bill gets cut from spending bill
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has not wavered on attaching the SAVE Act to a government funding bill, staying in line with Donald Trump.

item.title: Chairman of property firm Damac expresses concerns over 'expensive' Dubai
item.description: Increasing demand for property, especially in the luxury space, is boosting prices not just of homes but of everything else in Dubai.
